FuncDef:
The multicast rpf-vector path command configures an RPF vector path to a multicast source.
The undo multicast rpf-vector path command deletes an RPF vector path to a multicast source.
By default, no RPF vector path to a multicast source is configured.
CLIs: undo multicast rpf-vector path <path-name> [ strict | loose ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a name for an RPF vector path.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

Indicates a strict RPF vector path.
-

Indicates a loose RPF vector path.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure an RPF vector path to a multicast source, run the multicast rpf-vector path command.
